name: Resident Evil 5
content:
files:
- codecs: https://lutris.net/files/tools/windowsmedia-kb942423-x86-intl.exe
game:
  appid: 21690
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing wmp10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xact_jun2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /q
    description: Installing video codecs
    executable: codecs
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Changing to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
